name: Fire Red And Water Blue, The Legend Of the Omega Stone
name_original: Fire Red And Water Blue, The Legend Of the Omega Stone
description:
What is Fire Red and Water Blue?
> Fire Red and Water Blue is my small Project with storylines for an elemental war, which includes Side View Battling(Still In Development Access), And More Lures which will fits the Why Wont You love ME game Ive made from the passed days...
=========================================================
Fire Red Water Blue is a RPG created In RPG MAKER and Plugins created by the following:
YENFLY(Half of the Plugins)
VICTOR(THE TALENTED ONE)
Olivia(1/4 Plugins was hers)
And So on, this 3 is the Most important one ive included, and also THE HARD TO IMPLEMENT BUT YET I STILL FOLLOW THE ALPHA NET PLUGIN(Created By KageDesu), this game is Fully Nonstable and Full of bugs, Fps drop and more.. To those willing to give me resources, You can drop by and Email me at sibal.elane01@gmail.com
=========================================================
Fire Red Water Blue is a commercial game which cost money, For info please read below
>For Buying the Game For Worth $5, You are given the Game but without Updates, which will be helpful when you buy the Full game(For now, this state is Waste ful)
>For Buying the game For Worth $15 You are Given a special Key for every update ive done to this game, will be automatically yours, without having to pay anything...
==========================================================
Update Logs:
Update 0.0.1
Multiplayer Support(Already Mention)
5 Maps(1 Fully Playable)
7 Main Character (Having 1 Achievable Character)
Added Weapons...(Yeah...)
==========================================================
Thanks to People Who Bought this game, As i dont want to disappoint you, this game will be Priority than Why Wont You Love Me, Also IM NOT ACCEPTING REFUNDS, since this game is All right reserve and PLEASE, PLEASE, YOU MUST READ THE BUTTONS BEFORE CLICKING THEM, I know the game may be full of bug and in early access, but in the future, This game will be freed from paywalled, after im done making it...
==========================================================
What to support me even Bigger?
Here This will also help me:https://www.buymeacoffee.com/ItsMeDevRoland
You can Donate me any amount of Money, any value is a huge help to me as this will keep up my works, and help me parents :>
